com.github.zk1931.jzab

Class Participant

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.zk1931.jzab.Participant
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Follower, Leader

    public abstract class Participant
extends Object
    Participant is the base class for different roles of Jzab(Leader/Follower).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  Participant.Phase 
      protected class  Participant.SyncPeerTask
      Synchronizes server's history to peer based on the last zxid of peer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The configuration for Zab.
      protected Participant.Phase currentPhase
      Current phase of Participant.
      protected String electedLeader
      The elected leader.
      protected Election election
      The object used for election, the participant might receive election message from peers when it's in non-electing phase, it still needs to reply its vote to them.
      protected com.github.zk1931.jzab.Zab.FailureCaseCallback failCallback
      Callback which will be called in different points of code path to simulate different kinds of failure cases.

      The maximum batch size for SyncProposalProcessor.

      SnapshotProcessor takes snapshot.

      Callback interface for testing purpose.
      protected StateMachine stateMachine
      State machine callback.
      protected SyncProposalProcessor syncProcessor
      SyncProposalProcessor logs the transaction to disk.
      protected Transport transport
      Transport is used for communication between different Zab instances.

      • transport

        Transport is used for communication between different Zab instances.

        State machine callback.

      • serverId

        protected final String serverId
        Server Id of the participant.

      • messageQueue

        protected final BlockingQueue<MessageTuple> messageQueue
        Shared message queue. Passed from Zab and all the messages are enqueued from Zab.

      • lastDeliveredZxid

        protected Zxid lastDeliveredZxid
        The last delivered zxid. Passed from Zab to avoid deliver duplicated transactions.

      • electedLeader

        protected String electedLeader
        The elected leader.

      • config

        protected final ZabConfig config
        The configuration for Zab. It's passed from Zab.

      • failCallback

        protected com.github.zk1931.jzab.Zab.FailureCaseCallback failCallback
        Callback which will be called in different points of code path to simulate different kinds of failure cases.

      • stateChangeCallback

        protected com.github.zk1931.jzab.Zab.StateChangeCallback stateChangeCallback
        Callback interface for testing purpose.

      • participantState

        protected final ParticipantState participantState
        The State for Zab. It will be passed accross different instances of Leader/Follower class.

      • maxBatchSize

        protected final int maxBatchSize
        The maximum batch size for SyncProposalProcessor.

      • election

        protected final Election election
        The object used for election, the participant might receive election message from peers when it's in non-electing phase, it still needs to reply its vote to them.

      • currentPhase

        protected Participant.Phase currentPhase
        Current phase of Participant.

        Different kinds of pending requests.

        CommitProcessor notifies user different kinds of events.

        protected SnapshotProcessor snapProcessor
        SnapshotProcessor takes snapshot.

      • getMessage

        protected MessageTuple getMessage()
                           throws TimeoutException,
                                  InterruptedException
        Gets a message from the queue.
        Returns:
        a message tuple contains the message and its source.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - in case of timeout.
        InterruptedException - it's interrupted.

      • getMessage

        protected abstract MessageTuple getMessage(int timeoutMs)
                                    throws TimeoutException,
                                           InterruptedException
        Gets a message from the queue.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMs - how to wait before raising a TimeoutException.
        Returns:
        a message tuple contains the message and its source.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - in case of timeout.
        InterruptedException - it's interrupted.

      • getExpectedMessage

        protected MessageTuple getExpectedMessage(ZabMessage.Message.MessageType type,
                              String source,
                              int timeoutMs)
                                   throws TimeoutException,
                                          InterruptedException
        Gets the expected message. It will discard messages of unexpected type and source and returns only if the expected message is received.
        Parameters:
        type - the expected message type.
        source - the expected source, null if it can from anyone.
        timeoutMs - how long to wait before raising a TimeoutException.
        Returns:
        the message tuple contains the message and its source.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - in case of timeout.
        InterruptedException - it's interrupted.

      • getExpectedMessage

                              String source)
                                   throws TimeoutException,

      • waitForSync

        protected void waitForSync(String peer)
                    throws InterruptedException,
                           TimeoutException,
                           IOException
        Waits getting synchronizated from peer.
        Parameters:
        peer - the id of the expected peer that synchronization message will come from.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - in case of interruption.
        TimeoutException - in case of timeout.
        IOException - in case of IO failure.

      • changePhase

        protected abstract void changePhase(Participant.Phase phase)
                             throws IOException,
                                    InterruptedException,
                                    ExecutionException
        Change the phase of current participant.
        Parameters:
        phase - the phase change(DISCOVERING/SYNCHRONIZING/BROADCASTING).
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of IO failure.
        InterruptedException - in case of interruption.
        ExecutionException

      • onDelivered

        protected void onDelivered(ZabMessage.Message msg)
        Handled the DELIVERED message comes from CommitProcessor.

      • onFlush

        protected void onFlush(MessageTuple tuple)

      • onProposal

        protected void onProposal(MessageTuple tuple)

      • clearMessageQueue

        protected void clearMessageQueue()
        Clears all the messages in the message queue, clears the peer in transport if it's the DISCONNECTED message. This function should be called only right before going back to recovery.

      • getSyncTimeoutMs

        protected int getSyncTimeoutMs()
        Gets current synchronizing timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        synchronizing timeuout in milliseconds.

      • incSyncTimeout

        protected int incSyncTimeout()
        Doubles the synchronizing timeout.
        Returns:
        the old synchronizing timeout in milliseconds.

      • setSyncTimeoutMs

        protected void setSyncTimeoutMs(int timeout)
        Sets the synchronizing timeout.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the new synchronizing timeout in milliseconds.

      • adjustSyncTimeout

        protected void adjustSyncTimeout(int timeoutMs)
        Adjusts the synchronizing timeout based on parameter timeoutMs. The new synchronizing timeout will be smallest timeout which is power of 2 and larger than timeoutMs.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMs - the last synchronizing timeout in milliseconds.
